original_text: Jehoiakim was twenty and five years old when he began to reign, and he reigned eleven years in Jerusalem: and he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord his God.
korean_text: 여호야김이 왕위에 오를 때에 나이가 이십오 세라 예루살렘에서 십일 년 동안 다스리며 그의 하나님 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: Jehoiakim was twenty and five years old

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 열한 해 동안 통치했다

sentences.original_text: and he did that which was evil
in the sight of the Lord his God
